entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
